objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Intuitive Digital Controls
• Large Capacity Drum

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Clothes Dryer - Modern Laundry Made Simple
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Delicates
• ⚡ Energy-efficient operation with precise temperature control
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• 📱 Digital LED display showing remaining time and cycle status
• 🌟 Easy-access lint filter maintenance system
• 🔊 End-of-cycle signal to notify when clothes are done
• 💨 Advanced ventilation system for optimal drying performance
• 🛡️ Durable construction with reliable performance
• 🎛️ User-friendly control dial with multiple fabric care options
• 🚪 Wide-opening door for easy loading and unloading
• ♨️ Wrinkle prevention feature available

banner_details:
This banner design features a modern and clean layout for promoting a digital dryer. The main focus is the product image positioned prominently on the right side, with a subtle white panel behind it to highlight the product. On the left side, there are three main text elements: a bold headline (`heading`), a sleek subheadline (`subheading`), and a bullet-point feature list (`description`). The price (`price`) is displayed in large, attention-grabbing font at the bottom-left, above a call-to-action button made of a rounded rectangle (`cta_background`) with the text `SHOP NOW` (`cta`). Decorative SVG borders and geometric accents add a subtle frame, reinforcing a structured yet inviting look.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0F5C8C
- Sky Blue: #3D88B1
- Charcoal Black: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray Background: #F5F8FC
product_color: The product image showcases a modern, sleek washing machine with a minimalist color palette dominated by clean white (#FFFFFF) and matte black (#1A1A1A). The digital display introduces accents of electric blue (#00BFFF) and soft gray (#D3D3D3), adding a tech-savvy appeal. These contrasting colors are strategically placed—white for the body enhances purity and modernity, while black outlines (especially around the door) emphasize depth and focus. Delicate light gray hues (#E6E6E6) further aid in soft transitions. For an advertisement banner, use these core hex codes: white (#FFFFFF), black (#1A1A1A), electric blue (#00BFFF), light gray (#E6E6E6), and metallic silver (#C0C0C0).
